data.eml:eml: A new species of Ologamasus (Acari: Ologamasidae) from Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Moraes, De (2007): A new species of Ologamasus (Acari: Ologamasidae) from Brazil. Zootaxa 1462: 61-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.176465
